ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you drank before or during work or school?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you missed work or school because of drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have your drinking resulted in an argument/fight with family members?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you regretted afterward the things you did while drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you thought about cutting down on drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you got drunk or high from alcohol several days in a row?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you passed out from drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, has your drinking resulted in an argument/fight with your partner?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you got into a fight or heated argument with a stranger while drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you got into trouble with the law (other than driving-related) while drinking?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you drank alone?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you drank alcohol to get rid of a hangover?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you drank to forget troubles?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you were charged with drinking and driving?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you had a drinking-driving related accident?
Notes: 1=Never (did not occur in past 12 months); 2 = Rarely (1-2 times in past 12 months); 3 = Sometimes (3-5 times in past 12 months); 4 = Often (6-10 times in past 12 months); 5 = Frequently (more than 10 times in past 12 months)
